name: purs-changelog
description: A maintainer and contributor-friendly tool for generating a human-readable CHANGELOG.md

scripts.bundle: npm run build && npm run bundle:spago && npm run bundle:esbuild
scripts.test: echo "No tests have been written yet"
scripts.prepublishOnly: rm -rf output bundle && npm run bundle

author: Jordan Martinez <jordanalex.martinez@protonmail.com> (https://github.com/jordanmartinez/)
